subject: Kick Off the Season with a Special PaperCo Offer!
html_email:
Hi David,

Hope you’re enjoying the Texans offseason and keeping up with all the trades and game updates—looks like an exciting year ahead!

We’re rolling out a new premium subscription plan at PaperCo: get 10% off every paper order, every time. It’s our way of making sure you’re stocked up while you focus on what matters most (like catching those Texans games or perfecting your next carbonara).

If you’re interested, just reply to this email—I’d love to help you get started!

Best,
The PaperCo Team
